## Conditions.Condition.compare() method

Compares two conditions for sorting purposes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static compare(c1: Condition, c2: Condition): number;
```

</th><th>

Description

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

c2


</td><td>

[Condition](./ts-res.conditions.condition.md)


</td><td>

The second [condition](./ts-res.conditions.condition.md) to compare.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

number

A negative number if c1 should come before c2, a positive number if c2 should come before c1, or zero if they are equivalent.
